== Versions ==

||1.0-beta||Stable Release||
||1.0-SNAPSHOT||Current Development||

== Maven Repository ==

Wicket Bits repository provided from googlecode.com:

                http://wicketbits.googlecode.com/svn/maven

== Maven pom file example==
{{{
	<dependency>
		<groupId>com.googlecode.wicketbits</groupId>
		<artifactId>automagic-core</artifactId>
		<version>1.0-beta</version>
	</dependency>
}}}
{{{
	<repositories>	
		<repository>
			<id>wicketbits-repo</id>
			<name>Wicket Bits Repository</name>
			<url>http://wicketbits.googlecode.com/svn/maven</url>
			<layout>default</layout>
		</repository>
	</repositories>
}}}
